pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Subset Selection for Transformation Models // Greedy optimal subset selection for transformation models (Hothorn et al., 2018, doi:10.1111/sjos.12291 ) based on the abess algorithm (Zhu et al., 2020, doi:10.1073/pnas.2014241117 ). Applicable to models from packages 'tram' and 'cotram'.
